conbody.p: Unless an exception applies, use the clause at 252.225-7061, Restriction on the Acquisition of Personal Protective Equipment and Certain Other Items from Non-Allied Foreign Nations, in solicitations and contracts, including solicitations and contracts using FAR part 12 procedures for the acquisition of commercial products, including COTS items, and commercial services, and thatâ€”
(a) Are for the acquisition of covered items;
(b) Are for use within the United States; and
(c) Have an estimated value greater than $200,000.
